category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 14 (Honorary Industrial Safety Supervisor)
contents: Article 14 (Honorary Industrial Safety Supervisor) ① The Corporation may operate an honorary industrial safety supervisor to promote industrial accident prevention activities in accordance with the Industrial Safety Act and the collective agreement. ② The duties of an honorary industrial safety supervisor are in accordance with the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act. Pursuant to Article 32, Paragraph 2., ③ Matters necessary for the operation of honorary industrial safety supervisors, such as the target and scope, shall be separately determined by the Sanitary Safety and Security Commission.
